title: Inter-organizational Learning Strategies: Enhancing Collaborative Competencies through Case Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Organizational Management and Collaborative Processes
context.additional_context: Analysis of inter-organizational knowledge sharing and learning processes based on maritime industry case studies.

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more barriers to knowledge transfer occurring in cross-organizational learning processes.
Learners can design strategies to promote bidirectional learning across organizations by analyzing case studies.
Learners can evaluate the applicability of servitization models in cross-organizational collaboration within real-world work environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
